mapper.select: select r.seq, r.par_seq, r.mem_seq, r.contents, r.writen_date from com_reply r join company_board b on(r.par_seq=b.seq) order by r.writen_date desc
mapper.update: update com_reply set contents=#{contents} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.delete: delete from com_reply_reply where par_seq in (select r.seq from company_board b join com_reply r on(b.seq=r.par_seq) where r.par_seq=#{seq})
mapper.select: select p.seq, p.par_seq, p.mem_seq, p.contents, p.writen_date from company_board b join com_reply r on(b.seq=r.par_seq) join com_reply_reply p on(r.seq=p.par_seq) order by p.writen_date desc
mapper.update: update com_reply_reply set contents=#{recontent} where seq=#{idseq}
